name: wdio-json-html-reporter
description: A custom WebDriverIO reporter that generates JSON and HTML reports with timestamps, screenshots, and execution metadata.
author: Aswin Chembath

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && mkdir -p dist/cjs && babel index.js --out-file dist/cjs/index.js --env-name cjs && babel lib --out-dir dist/cjs/lib --extensions ".js" --env-name cjs
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf dist/esm && mkdir -p dist/esm && cp index.js dist/esm/index.js && cp -R lib dist/esm/lib
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
